name: Seaport
game_info: +1 Production and Gold from Sea Resources worked by this City. +15% Production when building Naval Units.City must be built on the coast.
strategy: A Seaport increases the Production output of an improved sea resource.
historical_info: A seaport is a modern super-harbor. It is a deep-water port which has facilities to handle the largest tankers and transports. Seaports usually contain a forest of cranes for the rapid unloading of cargo, which is then transported away via a bewildering maze of railroad tracks and roads. Modern seaports are controlled by harbor-masters in high-tech control rooms equipped with radar, satellite feeds, and sophisticated computers employing complex tracking software.
